entry.title: Full Research Papers on Youtube
entry.summary: [{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Reading research papers takes a lot of time. On top of that, I personally prefer to consume content through audio + video rather than through reading alone.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1590457984415,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"To make it easier to read more papers, I'm doing an experiment where I make videos that show the full…
entry.content:
[{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Reading research papers takes a lot of time. On top of that, I personally prefer to consume content through audio + video rather than through reading alone.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1590457984415,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"To make it easier to read more papers, I'm doing an experiment where I make videos that show the full text of a research paper, images as well as reads the paper out loud. ","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqTc8u62Cf-V5qNM6mk7J1A","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1590458506006,"type":"publii-html","content":"You might enjoy this if you:
  • Prefer to learn through hearing rather than reading alone.
  • Like to take a first-pass through a paper while commuting.
  • Spend long days staring at a screen and want to give your eyes a rest, lay back and hear a research paper at the end of the day.
  • Have a backlog of research papers to read and would like to catch up by reading some of them more casually.
  • Want to take a first-pass through a paper before deciding if it’s worth sitting down and working through the details.
","config":{"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1590458687411,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"How it works:
The videos are a combination of manual video editing and automated generation to make it easier to create. The key is using a cloud-based text to speech engine for reading out the full text. I find most text to speech voices pretty annoying but after some experimentation, I've found that using Google's WaveNet non-real-time cloud-based text to speech has the best sounding voice. I was pleasantly surprised to find a voice I enjoy hearing. (Full disclosure: I work at Google, but I have nothing to do with their text to speech offering nor Google cloud. This is just my personal opinion after testing out several different text to speech engines).
","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1590458820907,"type":"publii-header","content":"Videos","config":{"headingLevel":2,"textAlign":"left","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","customId":false,"id":"videos"}}},{"id":1590458886299,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"You can find all videos at this YouTube channel. Here's a sample of what's on there:","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqTc8u62Cf-V5qNM6mk7J1A","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1590459259680,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"PersonLab: Pose Estimation & Instance Segmentation with a Bottom-Up Geometric Embedding ","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8BtqFxo8gw","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1590459194073,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"The Lottery Ticket Hypothesis: Finding Sparse, Trainable Neural Networks","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MvsUpktOmkI","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1590459292136,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Accelerating Self-Play Learning in Go","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=saSLTjQKuN0","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1590459339761,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Mastering Atari, Go, Chess and Shogi by Planning with a Learned Model","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7C3abmLlUVw","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1590459470682,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"I tend to post papers I’m interested in, but if you have a paper you’d like me to generate a video for just send me a message on twitter at https://twitter.com/marcsto or email me at marcsto@gmail.com and I should be able to help","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}}]

entry.title: Punch Corona Frequently Asked Questions
entry.summary: [{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"What is Punch Corona? Punch Corona is a workout game where you get to beat up the corona virus. It uses machine learning to track your movements using your computer's camera.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1589051205887,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Where can I find it? It's available at https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1589051071644,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"What’s the difference between green and red viruses? Green…
entry.content:
[{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"What is Punch Corona? Punch Corona is a workout game where you get to beat up the corona virus. It uses machine learning to track your movements using your computer's camera.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1589051205887,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Where can I find it? It's available at https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1589051071644,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"What’s the difference between green and red viruses? Green should targets should be hit with the right hand, red with the left hand","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589051773641,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"What are the green and red semi-transparent cubes? These represent the location of your hands. As you move your hands in the real-world, the boxes should move with you. Your goal is to punch the viruses by moving the boxes.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589051084228,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Do the camera images get uploaded to a server? No. All processing happens locally on your computer to preserve your privacy.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589051089556,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"It doesn’t track my hands properly. What should I do?","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589051106286,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • The most common issue is standing too close to your webcam. Try taking 2 long strides away from your computer (you should be standing about 1.5 meters, or 5 feet from your webcam).
  • Make sure that your hands aren't leaving view of the camera when extending upwards or to the side. You can either move backwards more to fix this or punch less far.
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589052783505,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/7/onboarding-logo.png","imageHeight":1292,"imageWidth":1292,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589051688821,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"How can I test my setup? Join a game but ignore punching things for now. Try moving your hands up, down, left and right and see how well the red and green semi-transparent cubes are tracking. Also, take a look at the top right of the screen. You'll see what your camera sees as well as lines representing where it thinks your arms, eyes, and torso are. Make sure that the line to your wrist is always in-frame. You can do additional testing here.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://storage.googleapis.com/tfjs-models/demos/posenet/camera.html","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1589051107861,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"The game runs slowly: Try hitting the \"Improve Performance\" button at the bottom of the screen.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589051114454,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"There’s a lot of lag between when I move my hand and when it shows up on screen: Sorry about that. This alpha release needs a fairly powerful CPU to run the game as it needs to run both the game and a machine learning model that tracks your body movements. It's something we're working to improve. Try hitting the \"Improve Performance\" button to see if that helps. If it doesn't, contact me at marcsto@gmail.com with a bit of info on your computer specs and I'll see what I can do.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589051116094,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"How do I switch to a different webcam?","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589052221400,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • In chrome, go into Settings.
  • Search for camera
  • Click 'Site Settings'
  • Click 'Camera'
  • At the top, change which camera is selected in the drop-down menu.
  • Reload the game
    • ","config":{"listType":"ol","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589052453826,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Do I really need to punch the viruses, or can I just put my hands in front of them? Technically for now, you just need to move your hands in front of the . But that's not as satisfying as punching the corona virus and making is blow-up now is it? It's also a much better workout if you punch the viruses.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589052829784,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Who created the Punch Corona game? It was developed by Marc Stogaitis with the help of Mimi Sun.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589052880142,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Acknowledgements","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1589052883064,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • Created by Marc Stogaitis and Mimi Sun
  • We'd like to thank Dan Oved, Google Creative Lab and TensorFlow.js for their contributions to open source libraries that we used in this project.
  • Assets for the on-boarding flow are from https://www.freepik.com
  • The song is called happyrock and is available on bensound.
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1589053490711,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Where can I learn more? There's more info in the initial blog post here. You can also contact marcsto@gmail.com with any questions.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/introducing-punch-corona-alpha-release.html","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1589053569598,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/7/Screenshot-from-2020-05-06-16-36-53.png","imageHeight":1282,"imageWidth":2538,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}}]

entry.title: Introducing Punch Corona (Alpha Release)
entry.summary: [{"id":1588808598800,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":" Punch Corona is a workout game where you get to beat up the corona virus. It uses machine learning to track your movements using your computer's camera. No data ever leaves your device to preserve your privacy.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588808642611,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"It's a great way to spend your quarantine…
entry.content:
[{"id":1588808598800,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"
Punch Corona is a workout game where you get to beat up the corona virus. It uses machine learning to track your movements using your computer's camera. No data ever leaves your device to preserve your privacy.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588808642611,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"It's a great way to spend your quarantine time or get back in shape after gaining the quarantine 15.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588808716683,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"It detects your body movements from a simple webcam which means you don't need any special hardware like a Kinect or VR controller for a completely hands-free experience.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588808570272,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/1/punch-corona-1.png","imageHeight":1286,"imageWidth":2540,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588809363996,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"One pro tip: the most common issue is standing too close to the camera. Make sure to stand far enough back so that your camera can see your entire upper body and can still see your hands when they are stretched out punching up or down.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588809595950,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"This is an alpha release, so you may encounter issues. It needs a pretty good machine to run smoothly as it has to run both the game and a machine learning model to track your body movements. Email me at marcsto@gmail.com to let me know if you encounter any problems or if you enjoy the game.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588808778170,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Check it out at https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://marc.ai/punch-corona/","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}}]

entry.title: Don't Touch Your Face
entry.summary: [{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Don’t touch your face. This is a key recommendation from health organizations to help prevent the spread of the novel coronavirus COVID-19. But avoiding touching your face is hard!","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588810329589,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/2/dont-touch-face.png","imageHeight":480,"imageWidth":641,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588810323961,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"DontTouchFace.com is here to help. It combines the front-facing camera on your computer or phone with advanced…
entry.content: [{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Don’t touch your face. This is a key recommendation from health organizations to help prevent the spread of the novel coronavirus COVID-19. But avoiding touching your face is hard!","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588810329589,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/2/dont-touch-face.png","imageHeight":480,"imageWidth":641,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588810323961,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"DontTouchFace.com is here to help. It combines the front-facing camera on your computer or phone with advanced machine learning techniques to warn you when you touch your face. This helps you become aware of when you touch your face and reduce how often it happens over time.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://donttouchface.com","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588810476354,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"So how does it work? It uses computer vision to detect the location of your face and hand and warns you if they intersect. You'll hear a 'beep' making you aware that you're touching your face. Just remember to turn on your speakers or put on your headphones.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588810491027,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"No camera data ever leaves your device which is great to preserve your privacy.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588810465866,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"DontTouchFace.com was created by Marc Stogaitis and Mimi Sun. We'd like to thank Ann Yuan, Andrey Vakunov, MediaPipe, TensorFlow.js and Google Research for their contributions to open source libraries that we used in this project.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://DontTouchFace.com","noFollow":{},"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":{},"ugc":{},"download":false}}},{"id":1588810717599,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"","imageHeight":512,"imageWidth":512,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}}]

entry.title: Celebrity Look-alike for Android
entry.summary: [{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Celebrity Look-alike is a fun little Android app that determines which celebrities look like you. It uses machine learning based on a deep neural network to search through a database of over 20 000 celebrities. It's remarkably accurate!","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ai.marc.lookalike","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588816674682,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/3/celebrity-look-alike.png","imageHeight":1279,"imageWidth":1448,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588816742231,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"You can enter a picture by:","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588816847183,"type":"publii-list","content":"Taking a picture…
entry.content:
[{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Celebrity Look-alike is a fun little Android app that determines which celebrities look like you.

It uses machine learning based on a deep neural network to search through a database of over 20 000 celebrities. It's remarkably accurate!","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ai.marc.lookalike","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588816674682,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/3/celebrity-look-alike.png","imageHeight":1279,"imageWidth":1448,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588816742231,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"You can enter a picture by:","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588816847183,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • Taking a picture
  • Selecting an existing photo from your gallery or Google Photos
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588816915074,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"The app shows you your top celebrity matches. It may also include what you would look like as an older, younger, larger, smaller, female and male celebrity.

    A nice privacy feature of using the Android Celebrity Look-alike app is that all the processing happens directly on your device so your photos are never sent to a server which respects your privacy.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}}]

entry.title: Doodlecast for Chromecast Android App
entry.summary: [{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Doodlecast for Chromecast is a fun drawing game that pairs your Android phone and Chromecast together so you can play as a group.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.mimisun.doodlecast","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588817643927,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/4/doodlecast-bird.png","imageHeight":1005,"imageWidth":1911,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588817742860,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"One player picks a secret word to draw on their phone or tablet while the other players in the room try to guess…
entry.content:
[{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Doodlecast for Chromecast is a fun drawing game that pairs your Android phone and Chromecast together so you can play as a group.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.mimisun.doodlecast","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588817643927,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/4/doodlecast-bird.png","imageHeight":1005,"imageWidth":1911,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588817742860,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"One player picks a secret word to draw on their phone or tablet while the other players in the room try to guess it. The drawing and guesses are simultaneously displayed on the TV. It’s a fun game to play with your friends and family!","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588817808770,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Features:
","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588817818582,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • Draw on your phone, see it appear on your TV using your Chromecast!
  • Choose from a large list of words to draw
  • Other players in the room see what is being drawn on the Chromecast enabled TV and use their phones to guess the word
  • Players rotate turns, so everyone has a chance to draw!
  • Works even if you only have 1 Android phone
  • Works with both phones and tablets
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588817999466,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/4/doodlecast-logo.png","imageHeight":138,"imageWidth":180,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}}]

entry.title: PicLearn Helps You Learn Chinese and French
entry.summary: [{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"PicLearn are 2 Android apps that help you learn either Mandarin Chinese or French in a fun and visual way. Learn new words with pictures and sounds, and perfect your pronunciation through the use of voice recognition. ","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.piclearn.client.french","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588818907430,"type":"publii-gallery","content":{"images":[{"src":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-front.png","thumbnailSrc":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-front-thumbnail.png","height":693,"width":400,"dimensions":"400x693","alt":"","caption":""},{"src":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-images.png","thumbnailSrc":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-images-thumbnail.png","height":703,"width":400,"dimensions":"400x703","alt":"","caption":""}]},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","columns":3,"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588818306870,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"With PicLearn, you can learn and review words on…
entry.content:
[{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"PicLearn are 2 Android apps that help you learn either Mandarin Chinese or French in a fun and visual way. Learn new words with pictures and sounds, and perfect your pronunciation through the use of voice recognition.
","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.piclearn.client.french","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588818907430,"type":"publii-gallery","content":{"images":[{"src":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-front.png","thumbnailSrc":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-front-thumbnail.png","height":693,"width":400,"dimensions":"400x693","alt":"","caption":""},{"src":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-images.png","thumbnailSrc":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/gallery/piclearn-images-thumbnail.png","height":703,"width":400,"dimensions":"400x703","alt":"","caption":""}]},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","columns":3,"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588818306870,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"With PicLearn, you can learn and review words on the go and build up your Chinese vocabulary. ","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588819321607,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"You can select between 3 modes:","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588819286768,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • PicIt presents you with a Mandarin Chinese word and 4 images. Tap the image that represents the word.
  • SayIt uses voice recognition to help you practice your prononciation. Tap the microphone picture and say the word that the image represents.
  • CueIt shows you cue cards which you can use to quickly learn a new set of words.
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588819353510,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/5/piclearn-logo2.png","imageHeight":149,"imageWidth":302,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}}]

entry.title: About Marc Stogaitis
entry.summary: [{"id":1588820480976,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"I like to work on personal projects on weekends for fun and to learn new things. That's what this site is about. ","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588825585364,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/6/marc-with-android.jpg","imageHeight":1067,"imageWidth":1600,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820498280,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Machine Learning","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820508912,"type":"publii-list","content":"My dad and I have spent the last 22 years learning about machine learning by applying it to different games, focusing on chess.
entry.content:
[{"id":1588820480976,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"I like to work on personal projects on weekends for fun and to learn new things. That's what this site is about. ","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588825585364,"type":"publii-image","content":{"image":"https://marc.ai/media/posts/6/marc-with-android.jpg","imageHeight":1067,"imageWidth":1600,"alt":"","caption":""},"config":{"imageAlign":"center","link":{"url":"","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false},"advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820498280,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Machine Learning","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820508912,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • My dad and I have spent the last 22 years learning about machine learning by applying it to different games, focusing on chess. It started out as vb6 & c++. These days, it focuses Java and TensorFlow in python. For example, I've been implementing a version of Alpha Zero for chess.
  • Github link with some small experiments applying reinforcement learning to OpenAi Gym (sorry, most of my code is in a private repository but I do try to post interesting bits in the public github from time to time).
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://github.com/marcsto/rl","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588820625368,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Android Apps","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820633874,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • Punch Corona (Alpha): A workout game where you get to beat up the corona virus. It uses machine learning to track your movements using your computer's camera. No data ever leaves your device to preserve your privacy.
  • DontTouchFace.com: Combines the front-facing camera on your computer or phone with machine learning to warn you when you touch your face.
  • Celebrity Look-alike: Find out which celebrities look like you.
  • Doodlecast for Chromecast: A fun drawing game for your Chromecast that you can play as a group.
  • Gmote: Turns your phone into a remote control for your computer, allowing you to start and control movies and music at a distance.
  • PicLearn French and PicLearn Chinese: Helps you learn french and Mandarin Chinese in a fun and visual way. Learn new words with pictures and sounds. Perfect your pronunciation through the use of voice recognition.
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"http://www.gmote.org","noFollow":null,"targetBlank":true,"sponsored":null,"ugc":null,"download":false}}},{"id":1588820708290,"type":"publii-separator","content":false,"config":{"type":"dots","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588828712863,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Work","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820724084,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"I'm a Principal Software Engineer at Google. I'm on the Android team and work on the following projects:","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820776217,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • Fused Location
  • Activity Recognition
  • Android Sensors
  • Android Sensor Hub
  • Car Crash Detection
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.theverge.com/2019/10/1/20892875/google-pixel-personal-safety-app-car-crash-detection","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588820799698,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Talks","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1588820813464,"type":"publii-list","content":"
  • Google I/O Android Sensors & Location: What's New & Best Practices
  • Activity Recognition: Use low power sensors to detect user activity (100 Days of Google Dev)
  • Google I/O: Making apps context aware
    • ","config":{"listType":"ul","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""},"link":{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xgcj7VbDalk","noFollow":false,"targetBlank":false,"sponsored":false,"ugc":false,"download":false}}},{"id":1588824775356,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"You can reach me at marcsto@gmail.com","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}}]
